professional_summary: DevOps Analyst and Full Stack Developer with expertise in CI/CD pipelines, Kubernetes orchestration, and ITIL-based service management. Proven experience in optimizing deployment workflows, reducing incidents, and automating processes for scalable infrastructure. Skilled in cross-functional collaboration to deliver efficient and reliable software solutions.

technical_skills.name: DevOps: Kubernetes
technical_skills.description: Container orchestration in critical environments, ensuring scalability and resilience for cloud applications.

technical_skills.name: AI Prompt Engineering
technical_skills.description: Design and optimization of structured prompts for code generation (Python, JS, Java, C, CSS), data analysis, and image synthesis using LLMs (GPT-4, Claude, DeepSeek-R1) and Stable Diffusion models

experience.title: DevOps Analyst
description: Management and optimization of CI/CD pipelines for the National Mining Agency, ensuring efficient and reliable software delivery.
Maintenance and implementation of CI/CD processes for .NET projects, using Kubernetes for infrastructure management.
Collaboration with development and operations teams to streamline deployment workflows and improve system reliability.
Use of Kubernetes for container orchestration, ensuring scalable and resilient infrastructure.
Monitoring and troubleshooting pipelines, minimizing downtime and ensuring rapid resolution of deployment failures.
Contribution to the automation of build, test, and deployment processes, reducing manual intervention and increasing efficiency.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed and administered the ITIL Service Management System (Micro Focus Service Manager) at the Central Bank, leading system maintenance with a focus on efficiency and compliance with industry best practices.
Utilized technologies like JavaScript, PowerShell, and RAD to optimize processes and ensure continuous system operation.
Delivered significant improvements in operational efficiency, aligning solutions with dynamic corporate demands and contributing to high-quality service delivery.

experience.title: IT Support
experience.company: UniCathedral University Center, Barra do Garças, BR
description: Ensured proper functioning and proposed improvements for the university's IT infrastructure through planned maintenance and system monitoring.
Provided hardware support for desktops and servers, monitored systems using Intelbras NVR, and managed wired/wireless networks with pfSense firewall, supporting 500+ simultaneous devices.
Managed network-enabled multifunction printers controlled via Windows Active Directory with custom group policies.

experience.title: IT Support
experience.company: Única Consultores de Engenharia Urbana, Cuiabá, BR
description: Ensured proper functioning and proposed improvements within the office's IT scope through planned maintenance and system monitoring.

experience.title: Tutor

certifications: Introduction to Computer Science and Python Programming - MITx

projects.name: Portfolio Website - Larbaco.com
projects.description: Modern developer portfolio built with React.js and Firebase, featuring responsive design and multilingual support (EN/PT). Implements dynamic resume rendering, project showcases with NEAT AI/sparse matrix case studies, and SEO optimization via React Helmet. Demo: https://larbaco.com | Code: https://github.com/Larbaco/larbaco.com

projects.name: Zelda-NeAI
projects.description: NES Zelda recreation with NEAT AI integration - Python game engine using the Arcade library with tile-based maps, collision systems, and multi-room transitions, designed to evolve neural networks for autonomous dungeon navigation and combat via NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies (genetic algorithm). Includes sensory input processing for player/enemy positions and fitness metrics for evolutionary learning. Code: https://github.com/Larbaco/Zelda-NeAI

projects.name: MatrizEsparsa
projects.description: Academic implementation in C of sparse matrix operations using linked list storage, featuring memory-efficient addition/multiplication algorithms, CLI interface, and Python data conversion tools. Developed for high-performance computing scenarios with file I/O support and element-wise manipulation capabilities. Code: https://github.com/Larbaco/MatrizEsparsa

projects.name: Resume Editor - Self-Hosted
projects.description: Bilingual (EN/PT) resume editor with Node.js/Express backend and vanilla JavaScript frontend, featuring real-time JSON data management, REST API integration, and modular CSS architecture. Supports section-based editing with validation, local persistence, and mobile-responsive UI following the 7-1 pattern with BEM methodology. Code: https://github.com/Larbaco/resume-editor
